snippet.title: RPG Soul of Deva - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
©2013 KEMCO/Hit-Point

A journey far, far to the west joining humans and demons!
RPG Soul of Deva is now available for Android!

Get it now on:

Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.hitpoint.saiyugi&hl=en

Raglis, an organization established to help humans who suffer demon menace. Sania, a young woman who possesses a mysterious power able to destroy the demons, is heading to Raglis. On her way, she meets Shin, a young half-demon. Attracted by Sania's broad-minded and gentle personality, and by the powers she possesses, he decides to go with her on her journey. Can humans and demons really live together in harmony?

- Tactical battles with Battle Arts
- Soul Arms and Orbs
- A chance to get rare items every 30 minutes

※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
